[binaries]

# adapted from scipy
# specification of the -arch arm64 options for clang are necessary because

c = ['clang', '-arch', 'arm64']
cpp = ['clang++', '-arch', 'arm64']
strip = ['strip']
pkg-config = '/usr/local/bin/pkg-config'

[host_machine]
system = 'Darwin'
cpu_family = 'aarch64'
cpu = 'arm64'
endian = 'little'
